殣字的基本解释

殣
jìn
掩埋。
饿死。

殣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìn］
［《廣韻》渠遴切，去震，羣。］
(1)饿死。
(2)指饿死的人。《左传·昭公三年》：“道殣相望。”一说，殣为路旁的坟墓。《国语·楚语下》：“道殣相望。”韦昭注：“道冢曰殣。”《说文·歺部》：“殣，道中死人，人所覆也。”段玉裁注：“今《小雅·小弁》作墐。傳曰：'墐，路冢也。'按，'墐'者假借字，'殣'者正字也。”
(3)葬；掩埋。
(4)通“覲”。觐见。

殣字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【歹字部】　殣； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页582第38
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】渠吝切【正韻】具吝切，?音僅。【左傳·昭二年】道殣相望。【杜註】餓死爲殣。【詩·小雅】尚或殣之。今文作墐。傳云：路冢也。一曰埋也。　又與覲通。【前漢·郊祀歌】神裵回，若流放，殣冀親，以肆章。【註】孟康曰：殣，音覲。師古曰：言神靈裵回。流而不去，故使我得覲見，冀以親附而陳誠意，使章明之。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jìn］
["Guangyun" Qu Linqie, Quzhen, Qun. ]
(1) Starved to death.
(2) Refers to people who starve to death. "Zuo Zhuan · Zhaogong Three Years": "The Dao die face each other." One said, the die is a tomb on the side of the road. "Mandarin · Chu Yuxia": "Dao dying faces each other." Wei Zhao's note: "Dao Tomb is dying." "Shu Wen·Xiao Bu": "Dao, dead in the road, people are overthrown." Duan Yucai's note : "Today's "Xiaoya·Xiao Bian" is a maid. The legend says: "Ci, Lu Zhong also." Press, "Ci" is a borrowed word, and "Chan" is a straight word."
(3) Burial; buried.
(4) Through "觐". See you.
die of hunger

[Du Note] Starving to death is an obituary. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Shang or die. This article is written as a servant. Chuanyun: Luzhong also. One said to bury it.　And 觐通 again. [Pre-Han · Jiao Si Song] Divine return, if exiled, die in hope of marriage, with four chapters. [Note] Meng Kang said: Death, sound 觐. Shi Gu said: The gods and spirits will return.
